video.title: Angel Eyes
video.synopsis: A cardiac surgeon and a rescue worker who, in their youth, were forced apart by harsh circumstances are reunited. Can a sweet first love be rekindled?

episodes.synopsis: Top high school student Dong Joo delivers food to Soo Wan, a fellow student who likes astronomy, and soon both teens have stars in their eyes.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: On Soo Wan's birthday, Dong Joo invites her over to meet his family and takes her on a romantic adventure; Jung Hwa fills in for Dong Joo at work.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Hospital director Jae Beom tries to persuade Dylan Park (Dong Joo) to return to the U.S.; Dylan looks for answers about his mother's mysterious death.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hospital authorities frown on Soo Wan's defiant methods during emergencies; when Dong Joo confronts her, the two are struck by a sense of familiarity.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ji Woon tries to make peace between his girlfriend, Soo Wan, and Dong Joo, but he is unaware of their past; chance brings the former lovers together.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Soo Wan arrives at the emergency room -- as a patient; Ji Woon learns about Soo Wan’s first love; Jae Beom pushes Dong Joo to return to Boston.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Dong Joo and Soo Wan confirm their love, but Dong Joo still feels compelled to leave her; Young Ji tries to get her son, Ji Woon, and Soo Wan engaged.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Jae Beom encourages Ji Woon to court Soo Wan in hopes of breaking her away from Dong Joo and decrees that he will never sanction their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ji Woon discovers Dong Joo's identity as Soo Wan’s first love and urges him to leave Korea. When Dong Joo refuses, a fierce rivalry is born.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ji Woon's mother is disappointed when her son's love for Soo Wan goes unrequited; Dong Joo falls for Soo Wan and asks her to make binding promises.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Jae Beom gives Soo Wan and Dong Joo his blessing; Jung Hwa's hit-and-run case unfolds and leads to family upheaval; Dong Joo proposes to Soo Wan.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Soo Wan announces her engagement; Chief Kim Young Nak transfers Min Soo to a new job and tries to lure Woo Chul away from the hit-and-run case.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Suspicions and family entanglements pose obstacles to Dong Joo and Soo Wan's plans; Woo Chul's investigation leads him to an ambush in a junkyard.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Soo Wan finds out who donated the eyes that saved her sight; Dong Joo asks Jae Beom to persuade Soo Wan that they should leave quickly for Boston.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Soo Wan hears a shocking revelation about her father; Dong Joo fears the consequences that fall on the heels of the truth and tries to save Jae Beom.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Hye Joo learns that it was Soo Wan who received the corneal transplant from her mother; Soo Wan and Dong Joo arrive at a painful turning point.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Jae Beom makes a final desperate effort to hand over a recording to Dong Joo; Ji Woon is tormented by guilt; Soo Wan's sorrow robs her of her vision.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Dong Joo worries about Soo Wan's mental state; Ji Woon frets over Young Ji's sacrifices on his behalf; Min Soo recognizes the voice of the 911 caller.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: A year after Soo Wan's disappearance, Dong Joo pines for her return; Ji Woon returns from volunteering in Haiti; Ji Hoon asks Don Joo for a favor.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Dong Joo is pained by Soo Wan's refusal to return home; rumors fly at work about Dong Joo's love life; Han Yuri accuses Dong Joo of deceit.
episodes.title: Episode 20
